name: onenon

stmt.origin: mpdan(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c0, cdm(ccrd)), wbr(c0, cen, c0))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c0, cdm(ccrd)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, con0), wbr(c0, cen, c0))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wbr(c0, cen, c0)), wcel(c0, cdm(ccrd)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ On → c0 ∈ dom(card))
⊣ (c0 ∈ On → c0[≅]c0)
⊣ ((c0 ∈ On ∧ c0[≅]c0)→ c0 ∈ dom(card))
